Ads.step2: Musically users could record videos of 15-seconds to 1-minute in one or multiple shots, lip-syncing to sounds or comedy.The platform also enabled editing, through 14 pre-set filters and effects that allow a change in speed or reversing the motion of the recording.
Ads.step3: Musically also had a feature to create shorter videos, named live moments, which were essentially GIFs with music. Users could remuse (reuse) sounds created by other users, which instills a new level of engagement with the content.
